name: European Union Romania Business Society AISBL
memberOrga: We are in the process of recruiting membership and building our networks.
goal: The primary goal of EUROBUS is to promote the opportunities for business and commerce between hte EU and Romania, to promote information about the investment climate in Romania, to promote good governance in Romania and all of the countries of the Danube Region  and to publish and distribute information, organise marketing and lobbying to promote the objectives of the Society.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
Internal Market and business legislation relating to the environment and to industry, Media and Audiovisual legislation, export trade and commerce, free movement of goods, justice home affairs and human rights.

In particular the Society has campaigned over its first 12 months of existence to promote awareness of the investment opportunities in Romania with a view to encouraging direct inward investment into the country.
